You have comprehensive knowledge in your fields of interest. When you succeed at a [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) check, you gain additional information or context. When you critically succeed at a check to Recall Knowledge, you get additional information or context or can ask an additional follow-up question (the GM chooses which).
